title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook guanciale until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, both cheeses, and plenty of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining the spaghetti.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with guanciale, remove from heat.
Quickly toss with egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless chicken, cut into chunks
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, half the garam masala, cumin, coriander, salt and pepper for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook marinated chicken pieces until golden brown and cooked through.
Remove chicken and set aside.
In the same skillet, sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add tomato sauce and remaining garam masala, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and return chicken to the skillet.
Simmer for 5 more minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh and crispy salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and dry romaine lettuce thoroughly, then chop into bite-sized pieces.
For dressing, mash garlic and anchovies into a paste.
Whisk in lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and egg yolk.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking to emulsify.
Season with salt and pepper.
Toss lettuce with dressing until well coated.
Top with Parmesan cheese and croutons before serving.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious beef tacos with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese in a crispy shell.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water.
Simmer for 5 minutes until thickened.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and onions.
Serve with sour cream and salsa on the side.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are soft, chewy, and absolutely delicious.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, cream butter and both sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then vanilla.
Gradually mix in flour mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown. Cool on wire rack.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 500°F (260°C) with pizza stone if available.
Roll out pizza dough on floured surface to desired thickness.
Transfer to pizza pan or parchment paper.
Spread pizza sauce evenly, leaving border for crust.
Add mozzarella slices and tomato slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Top with fresh basil leaves before serving.
